title: Iperius Backup Desktop Full 5.8.0 Multilingual + Portable With M
description:
[img]http://babupc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Iperius-Backup-Desktop.gif[/img]


Iperius Backup Desktop

Iperius Backup – The complete and powerful software for workstation and server backup. Disaster recovery (disk image with hardware independent restore), backup to NAS, remote backup to Cloud and FTP, backup of websites, backup of open files (Volume Shadow Copy), tape backup, database backup, all functions included, lifetime upgrades even for new features.

Features:

    Drive image backup (disaster recovery)
    Backup to Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox
    Remote backup FTP/SFTP
    Backup to any Tape (LTO, DAT, etc.)
    Backup of any database
    Compression and AES encryption
    Scheduling of automatic backups
    Installation as service
    Backup of VMware ESXi virtual machines
    Upload and Download of websites
    Flexible backup retention policies
    Incremental backup and synchronization
    Open file backup (VSS)
    Backup to NAS, USB drives, RDX, etc.

New features
